Description: Enables marketers to plan and execute personalized marketing automation campaigns.
Name: Oracle Eloqua

Methods.Name: List Users
Methods.Description: Retrieves all users that match the criteria specified by the request parameters.

Methods.Name: Get User
Methods.Description: Retrieves the user specified by the id parameter. For security purposes, full user details are only displayed in a response if the user profile being retrieved via the API is the same user performing the request.

Methods.Name: Update User
Methods.Description: Updates the user specified by the id parameter.

Methods.Name: Get Contact(s) by Email
Methods.Description: Retrieves all contacts that match the email address supplied

Methods.Name: Update Contact
Methods.Description: Updates the contact asset specified by the id parameter.

Methods.Name: List Contacts
Methods.Description: Retrieves all contacts that match the criteria specified by the request parameters.

Methods.Name: List Updated Contacts
Methods.Description: Retrieves all contacts created or modified since last run.

Methods.Name: Get Contact
Methods.Description: Retrieves the contact specified by the Contact ID parameter.

Methods.Name: Delete Contact
Methods.Description: Deletes a contact specified by the Contact ID parameter.

Methods.Name: Create Contact
Methods.Description: Creates a contact that matches the criteria specified by the request body.

Methods.Name: Update Contact List
Methods.Description: Creates a contact list that matches the criteria specified by the request body.

Methods.Name: Get Contact List
Methods.Description: Retrieves the contact list specified by the Contact List ID parameter.

Methods.Name: Delete Contact List
Methods.Description: Deletes the contact list specified by the Contact List ID parameter.

Methods.Name: Create Contact List
Methods.Description: Creates a contact list that matches the criteria specified by the request body.

Methods.Name: List Contact Lists
Methods.Description: Retrieves all contact lists that match the criteria specified by the request parameters.

Methods.Name: Remove Contact From List
Methods.Description: Removes a contact from the specified list.

Methods.Name: List Updated Contact Lists
Methods.Description: Retrieves all contact lists created or modified since last run.

Methods.Name: Add Contact To List
Methods.Description: Adds a contact to the specified list.

Methods.Name: Get Base URL
Methods.Description: Determine the base URL for your API calls.

Methods.Name: Create Account
Methods.Description: Creates an account that matches the criteria specified by the request body.

Methods.Name: List Accounts
Methods.Description: Retrieves all accounts that match the criteria specified by the request parameters.

Methods.Name: Update Account
Methods.Description: Updates the account specified by the Account ID parameter.

Methods.Name: Delete Account
Methods.Description: Deletes the account specified by the Account ID parameter.

Methods.Name: List Updated Accounts
Methods.Description: Retrieves all accounts created or updated since last run.

Methods.Name: Get Account
Methods.Description: Retrieves the account specified by the Account ID parameter.

Methods.Name: List Activities
Methods.Description: Retrieves all activities that match the criteria specified by the request parameters.

Methods.Name: Create Import/Export Synchronisation
Methods.Description: Create a new import or export synchronisation.

Methods.Name: Export Contact Data
Methods.Description: Retrieve a contact export definition's synced data.

Methods.Name: Create Contact Import Definition
Methods.Description: Create a new contact import definition.

Methods.Name: Get Synchronization
Methods.Description: Check the status of a synchronization.

Methods.Name: Create Contact Export Definition
Methods.Description: Create a new contact import definition.

Methods.Name: Upload Contact Data
Methods.Description: Upload data for a contact import definition.

Methods.Name: Create Custom Object Record
Methods.Description: Creates a custom object record.
